data.name: Building a Sticky Consumer Business
data.summary:
Highlights of our next session:
- How are businesses focusing on protection of customer interests and managing customer engagement & retention?
- What are the main focus investment areas for businesses at the moment?
- What changes would we see in the the consumer behaviour post-covid19?
data.speakers:
Abheek Anand, Managing Director, Sequoia Capital
Roshni Mahtani Cheung, Founder and Group CEO, theAsianparent.com
